entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
